itinerary.event_name: Indoor Exploration of South Lake Union

activities.description: Discover the fascinating exhibits at MoPOP featuring music, science fiction, and pop culture.

activities.activity_name: Lunch Break at a Local Eatery
activities.description: Enjoy a delicious lunch at one of the charming local eateries in South Lake Union.
Witness the captivating art of glassblowing and even create your own unique glass piece.
Participate in the Sponsored Activity at the Sponsored Location.
Stroll through the vibrant Pike Place Market, sampling local delicacies and enjoying the lively atmosphere.
Descend into the hidden underground passages of Seattle and learn about the city's intriguing history.
